snippet: The price of the most expensive tickets for the Super Bowl next February will more than double, to about $2,600 apiece
abstract: NFL Roundup; NFL announces that it will raise prices for most expensive seats at 2014 Super Bowl to about $2,600 each, up from $1,250 in previous year; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The price of the most expensive tickets for the Super Bowl next February will more than double, to about $2,600 apiece

headline.main: Costliest Super Bowl Tickets Will Become Even Pricier
headline.print_headline: Costliest Super Bowl Tickets Will Become Even Pricier
